~Stand Proud~.Effect: If the Bear ends its turn without having dealt Damage, it heals for 1d6.
~Stand Proud~.Upgrade: Only works in Worthy Combats, and if the Bear is not Fallen.

~Roar and Maul~.Effect: The target takes 1d4 Damage (1d10 if Shapeshift) and is Feared.

~Swiping Attack~.Effect: Critical Strike - If you rolled maximum on the Bear's Attack, deal 50% of the rolled Damage to all Units within 1 meter of the Bear!

~Pack Movement~.Effect: All Wolf Damage has ^Dice Upgraded^ to the next die type if _flanking_ the target (including Leap).

~Leap~.Range: Exactly 3 meters range, no more, no less.
~Leap~.Effect: The Wolf leaps at a target. If Flanking it, the target takes 1d2 Damage (1d6 if Druid). Otherwise, it becomes Slowed.

~Prowl~.Effect:
The Cat and it's owner leave no tracks and can see in the Darkness (10 meters).
The Cat and it's owner are Skilled in Stealth (see Skills).

~Cat Ambush~.Effect: The Cat's first regular attack every Combat deals +1d6 Damage (+1d8 if Druid).

~Rake~.Effect:
Make a (Cat's) Dexterity Check against a Unit's Might Check.
If you pass, the Unit becomes Crippled. Otherwise, deal Damage 1d8 Damage (4d6 + 4 if Druid) to it.
Does not work on Units that can't bleed.

~Antler Charge~.Effect:
The Elk has 7 Movement.
If the Elk moved at least 5 meters in a straight line, then attacked a target in front of it, the attack deals +1d4 Damage and pushes the target 3 meters away.
~Antler Charge~.Notes: In front can also mean diagonally in front (e.g. front-left, or front-right). Does not work on Large or Epic Units.

~Rideable Steed~.Effect: You (or an ally) can ride your Elk as if you were Trained in riding. The Elk's speed is 10 when not in combat.

~Majestic Buffet~.Effect: Use this after the Elk made an attack. The target becomes Feared.
~Majestic Buffet~.Notes: If you are a Druid, use this after you performed an Animal Attack.

~Spikes~.Effect: After a Unit makes a melee Attack on the Porcupine, the attacker takes 1d4 Pierce Damage.

~Quillshot~.Effect: All Units within 3 meters of the Porcupine are shot with arrow-like quills and take 2d6 + 2 Pierce Damage (3d6 + 3 if Druid).

~Poison Fangs~.Effect: Giant Spider Attacks deal +1d6 extra Poison Damage to targets already affected by Crowd Control.
~Poison Fangs~.Upgrade: Also, passively, the Spider can walk on walls at half speed.

~Web~.Effect: A target must succeed a Dexterity Check against 9 or be Rooted.

~Talons~.Effect:
Bird of Prey have 2 Defense and can freely Break their Movement.
An enemy starting its turn 1 meter from the Bird of Prey is Slowed.

~Beak Poke~.Effect: A Unit near the Bird of Prey takes 1d8 Pierce Damage (2d8 for Shapeshift) and is Blinded.

~Stampede~.Effect: If the Gorilla moves in a straight line at least 3 meters and then Pet Attacks, the Attack deals +1d4 Damage.

~Fling Over~.Effect:
Make a (Gorilla's) Might Check against a Unit's Might Check. If you pass, it takes 1d6 Smash Damage (2d6 if Druid) and is thrown up to 3 meters in a chosen direction.
If it collides with another Unit or an obstacle/wall, they both take an extra 1d6 (2d6 if Druid) Smash Damage.

Dragon Wyrm.Description:
This small to medium sized dragon has a color and an element specific to it (Fire/Cold/Shock/Acid/Poison).
That element is called the Dragon Wyrm Element.

~Element Resistance~.Effect:
The Dragon Wyrm's Pet Attacks have 3 meters range and the Damage type is the Dragon Wyrm's element.
You and your pet take -50% Damage from the Dragon Wyrm Element.
~Element Resistance~.Upgrade:
If you get a Dragon Wyrm as an Animal Companion, you choose its element when you get it.
If you're a Druid, you must choose the element every time you Shapeshift into the Dragon Wyrm.
The element choices are Fire, Cold, Shock, Scourge, Poison, Acid.
~Element Resistance~.Notes: Applies to Animal Attack if it's not a pet.

~Dragon Breath~.Effect:
The pet breathes its Dragon Wyrm Element in a 4x1 meter line.
All Units in the area take 2d6 Damage of that type (4d6 if Druid)

Owlbolg.Description: An Owlbolg is an ape-like owl creature with an innate spell casting talent.

~Owl Bolt~.Effect:
Owlbolg's Pet Attacks have 10 meters range and shoot a magical missile that deals Pulse Damage.
Owlbolgs can use Scrolls and Potions for 1 Action.
~Owl Bolt~.Notes: Applies to Animal Attack if it's not a pet.

~Quicken Spell~.Effect: The Owlbolg casts a Spell you know that takes Half-Action.
~Quicken Spell~.Notes: If the Spell has a Cooldown, it goes on Cooldown. If it costs something to cast it, you must still spend that cost.

~Druid Spellcasting~.Effect: As a Druid, while Shapeshifted into an Owlbolg, you can cast Spells.

~Blood Vim~.Effect: Every turn, you have an extra Half-Action.
~Blood Vim~.Notes: ...or Action if you somehow got this as a pet.

~Hunger Claws~.Effect: The Lycanthrope Animal Attacks heal for 50% of the Damage rolled. However, for each Half-Action spent not Animal Attacking, the Lycanthrope takes 5 True Damage.

~Ominous Howl~.Effect: All Units that can hear you become Feared.

Golem.Description:
A golem is an artificial life form created from a durable material.
When creating the golem, choose the material - clay, metal, flesh.
A golem's size is Large.
It has different abilities based on its material.

~Attack~.Effect: Deals 1d8 + Your Highest Stat Smash Damage.

~Clay - Earth Rumble~.Effect: All enemies within 4 meters of the Golem take 8 Shock Damage and become Slowed.

~Metal - Iron Curtain~.Effect: The Golem provides Cover to all allies within 1 meter of it (but not to itself).

~Flesh - Incite Fear~.Effect:
All enemies within 4 meters of the Golem take 1d8 + 2 Psychic Damage.
All Units within 1 meter of the Golem become Feared.

~Shield Bash~.Effect: If you roll 6 on the Pet Attack die, the target must pass a Might Check against ^Your Initiative^ or be Single-Stunned and pushed 3 meters away.
~Shield Bash~.Notes: Requires to be next to the target.

~Routing Squire~.Effect: When the Squire comes within 1 meter of a Worhty Enemy, it gains 3 Shielding. Then it can't gain the Shielding from the same Enemy for the rest of the combat.

~Quickfoot~.Effect: Has 6 Movement Speed and can Break its Movement.

~Backstab~.Effect: The Squire's Flank Attacks deal an extra 1d4 Damage.

~Camouflage~.Effect: The Squire becomes effectively invisible to Units more 3 or more meters away from it.

~Magic Attack~.Effect: Pet Attack has 5 meter range and the Damage type can be Fire, Cold or Shock.

~Spellcasting~.Effect: Using its Action, the Squire can cast any Basic Ability up to Level 5 from the Elemental, Arcane or Mysticism schools that cost no Mana and deals no Damage. The Squire can cast such Abilities a total of 3 times per Adventure, irrespective of those Abilities' Cooldowns.

~Freedom~.Range: Use when an Ally becomes affected by a Crowd Control. Remove that Crowd Control from it.
~Freedom~.Notes: Doesn't work for area persistent CC like Hard Terrain, fog-like effects, etc.

~Inflict Fear~.Effect: Any number of chosen Units the Old God can see become Feared.
~Inflict Fear~.Upgrade: _Upon inflicting fear, the curse given must be taken from energy elsewhere, and a random place on the planet becomes corrupted with strange energy and radiation, inflicting mental illness and mutating the flora and fauna around it._

~Inflict Unmaking~.Effect: Any number of chosen Units the Old God can see take Damage equal to 10% of their Max Health.
~Inflict Unmaking~.Upgrade: _Upon inflicting unmaking, a natural disaster occurs somewhere on the planet - a tidal wave, earthquake or plague takes place._

~Inflict Rapture~.Effect: A Unit the Old God can see takes 1d100 Damage and becomes permanently cursed, haunted by voices of evil, paranoia, night terrors and generalized anxiety.
~Inflict Rapture~.Upgrade: _Upon inflicting rapture, a random star in the galaxy explodes at the might of the old god's power._

~Divinity~.Effect: The Old God may become invisible, immaterial or teleport anywhere it wants, though its actions may seem difficult to understand. It may also cast any Basic Utility Ability (without spending Mana).
